price: And the Trumpet will be blown[12]; that is the Day of [the given] warning.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ
footnotes: [12] i.e., the second blow that will bring all back to life for judgment.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
